Name: Maximilien Houemang
description:
Mr. Maximilien is married with two children. The older child is 11 and the younger one is nine. The two children go to school and he is responsible for four individuals. Mr. Maximilien has been rearing pigs for five years. He buys his animals in neighbouring villages.
With the loan he requests, he would like to buy five pigs, two sacks of corn residue, and 500 kg of  beverage residue.
He would like to use the profits made from his loan to expand his business. He plans to take care of his children's future.
